title: PTD Today — Media
disclaimer: Informational only — AI-generated summaries; may contain errors. Verify with the original video.

items.title: Build your first GraphRAG Powered Agent! (No Graph Expert Required) | Databases for AI

ai.summary: Based on the available description… This session demonstrates how to build a knowledge graph (GraphRAG) quickly using the AI tools teams already have, with a live demo on real documents. It emphasizes unlocking knowledge trapped in docs, PDFs, and wikis without a six-month project or graph expertise.
bullets: Shows how knowledge in docs, PDFs, and wikis can be unlocked via knowledge graphs.
Claims you can build a usable graph in an afternoon, not months.
Uses the same AI tools teams are already working with.
Includes a live demo using real documents.
No graph expert or six-month project required.
takeaways: Unlock operational and technical knowledge stored in internal docs, PDFs, and wikis.
Rapid prototyping—can be built in an afternoon, enabling fast evaluation and iteration.
Leverages existing AI investments so you likely don’t need new specialized hires.
Live-demo focus suggests a practical, hands-on approach for internal pilots.

items.title: Watch Live: Fed Chair Jerome Powell Holds News Conference | WSJ

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell speaks to reporters following the Federal Reserve's two-day policy-setting meeting. WSJ News streamed the live press conference for viewers to hear Powell's comments on the Fed's actions and outlook.
bullets: Event: Live press conference with Fed Chair Jerome Powell
Timing: Immediately follows the Fed's two-day policy-setting meeting
Platform: Streamed by WSJ News
Content focus: Powell addressing reporters about the Fed meeting
Tags included in description: #JeromePowell #Fed #WSJ
takeaways: Monitor Powell's remarks for any clarification or context about the recent policy meeting that could affect interest rate expectations
Statements on economic outlook may influence financing costs and investment planning—stay alert for commentary relevant to capital and operational budgeting
Market reactions to the press conference can affect funding conditions and asset valuations; maintain readiness to adjust timing of major procurement or expansion decisions

items.title: Deutsche Bank accelerates Cloud journeys with Google Cloud Consulting

ai.summary: Based on the available description… Google Cloud Consulting helped Deutsche Bank design novel learning experiences that trained thousands of engineers to become fluent in cloud engineering. The program used Generative AI to create personalized, interactive training that blends on-demand convenience with instructor-led effectiveness, and Google Cloud Consulting Learning Services provided the creative and technical expertise to build the Deutsche Bank Cloud Engineering Program and accelerate their cloud journey.
bullets: Consulting designed novel learning experiences for cloud engineering.
Program trained thousands of Deutsche Bank engineers to become cloud‑fluent.
Generative AI was used to create personalized, interactive training.
Training combined on‑demand learning with instructor‑led elements.
Google Cloud Consulting Learning Services provided creative innovation and technical expertise.
takeaways: Investing in scalable, personalized training can accelerate enterprise cloud adoption timelines.
Generative AI can help deliver tailored upskilling at scale for large engineering teams.
Blended on‑demand and instructor‑led formats increase training reach while maintaining effectiveness.
Engaging specialized consulting teams brings the creative and technical capabilities needed to build enterprise learning programs.
Faster cloud fluency across engineers supports quicker progress on migration and modernization efforts.

items.title: Year-end toolkit: Strengthening audit committee collaboration

ai.summary: Based on the available description… This episode focuses on strengthening the finance team's engagement with the audit committee during the year‑end accounting and reporting process, emphasizing clearer communication, streamlined reporting, and preparedness for a busy governance agenda. It also covers emerging oversight topics including AI (risks, opportunities, controls), enterprise risk management, cyber risk in the age of AI, and elevating proxy disclosures.
bullets: Practical guidance on improving management/audit committee communication and collaboration at year‑end.
Highlights key year‑end issues finance teams should be ready to address.
Dedicated discussion of AI oversight: risks, opportunities, and control considerations.
Focus on enhancing enterprise risk oversight and navigating evolving cyber risks tied to AI.
Advice on elevating proxy disclosures and related governance communications.
takeaways: Ensure you can clearly explain AI risks, opportunities, and control frameworks to the audit committee — these will be a focus at year‑end.
Prioritize cyber risk discussions that reflect AI‑driven threat dynamics when briefing governance stakeholders.
Integrate enterprise risk considerations and transformation initiatives into year‑end reporting to meet expanded oversight expectations.
Streamline reporting and key messages so the audit committee can efficiently address a packed agenda.

items.title: Zip Up, Clip In, Copilot On

ai.summary: Based on the available description, the video shows Jo discovering how Copilot Groups makes route planning easy. It highlights the power and simplicity of Microsoft Copilot for coordinating routes.
bullets: Focuses on route planning made easy.
Features Jo discovering Copilot Groups.
Positions Copilot Groups as a coordination tool.
Short, promotional overview emphasizing simplicity.
takeaways: If your operations involve route planning, Copilot Groups is presented as a tool that could simplify coordination and planning.
Decision-makers should note the emphasis on ease of use when evaluating route-planning solutions.
Consider assessing Copilot Groups for team-based routing and scheduling workflows.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description… AI in audit is presented as an everyday tool that supports repetitive tasks, large-scale data analysis and decision-making. KPMG directors Katarzyna Chojniak and Alicja Barska outline practical applications (e.g., AI Transaction Scoring, Clara AI assistants, KPMG Clara platform), client benefits from full-population analysis and real-time management, as well as implementation challenges, data security and regulatory considerations and required auditor competencies.
bullets: AI tools enable analysis of full populations (moving beyond traditional sampling).
Examples highlighted: AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI conversational assistants and specialized agents.
KPMG Clara platform and Clara for Clients support real-time audit management and client communication.
AI aids documentation, disclosure analysis and automates repetitive audit tasks.
Key concerns include auditor upskilling, implementation challenges, data security and regulatory environment.
takeaways: Prepare infrastructure and processes to support large-volume, full-population data analysis for audits.
Prioritize data security, governance and regulatory compliance when enabling AI-driven audit workflows.
Anticipate improved audit speed and transparency through integrated platforms (e.g., KPMG Clara) that connect auditors and clients.
Invest in staff competencies in AI, data analytics and technology adaptation to realize audit benefits.

items.title: Arknights: Endfield | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Launch Trailer

ai.summary: Based on the available description… Arknights: Endfield has officially launched and includes NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation. The 3D real-time strategy RPG puts players in the role of the Endministrator on Talos-II, and the trailer footage was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings using DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode.
bullets: Arknights: Endfield launch announcement highlighting NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation.
Game described as a 3D real-time strategy RPG where players are the Endministrator exploring Talos-II.
Trailer captured on GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra with DLSS 4 MFG 4X Mode.
Links provided for game site and DLSS 4 details (NVIDIA), plus multiple official social channels.
Video published on NVIDIA GeForce’s channel with related hashtags #ArknightsEndfield #RTXOn #DLSS4.
takeaways: Adoption of DLSS 4 in a newly launched title indicates growing demand for GPUs that support DLSS 4/Multi Frame Generation.
Showcasing 4K Ultra capture with DLSS 4 MFG 4X Mode implies increased reliance on high-end GPU performance for premium visuals.
Content capture and demonstration workflows are leveraging NVIDIA RTX-class hardware (RTX 5080) to highlight next-gen upscaling capabilities.
